short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize all your memes and automate image storage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of dragging files to your desktop? Do you have memes cluttering all your folders?  Well fear no more, this plugin allows you to download all your memes straight to the specified folder all from your mouse immediately.  Just right click on the image, no matter the source and the plugin will organize and save all in one click.
